name: Flying Moto Pilot Simulator
description:
Want to fly your motorbike like an airplane? This Game is perfect for you!
You can test your airplane pilot skills and motorbike driving ability at the same time.
Drive your bike through endless asphalt roads between rocks and mountains. Open your robot wings to transform into a flying motorbike, discover new landscapes, Accelerate your sports bike do stunts and drifts !

You are free in a world that you can do what you want!

Flying Moto Pilot Simulator is made for all fans of flying car games, motorbike games and Airplane Flight games


"Cyber Moto", "Super Moto","AT X61" and "Extreme Moto" vehicles requires in-app purchase.
developers: EXTREMESOFT BILISIM REKLAMCILIK TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
publishers: EXTREMESOFT BILISIM REKLAMCILIK TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
